heading: Transformations that inspire.
intro: Real members. Real stories. Real growth. Hear from the Adze family about their journey.

testimonials.name: Anitha Ravi
testimonials.quote: Adze isn't a regular gym. The trainers remember your goals, your kids' names, and they show up when you need the extra push. I've lost 18 kg and gained so much confidence. The community here is everything.

testimonials.name: Sathish Kumar
testimonials.quote: From day one Kevin coached me like a friend. The weekly assessments kept me accountable without the guilt. I went from barely walking to running 5K. This place changed my life.

testimonials.name: Priya Lakshmi
testimonials.quote: The glass studio vibes, the playlists, the community â€” it's the reset button I didn't know I needed. Rohith's yoga classes have transformed my flexibility and mental clarity.

testimonials.name: Raghav Narayan
testimonials.quote: It's the only place where my powerlifting meets mobility work. Coach Suriya's energy is unreal. I've hit PRs I never thought possible, and the form coaching is next level.

testimonials.name: Meera Krishnan
testimonials.quote: I was intimidated by group classes, but Adze made me feel welcome from day one. The energy in Suriya's bootcamp sessions is infectious. I'm stronger, faster, and more confident than ever.

testimonials.name: Arjun Menon
testimonials.quote: Kavin designed a program that fit my crazy work schedule. The 1-on-1 attention and nutrition guidance helped me drop 12 kg while building muscle. Worth every rupee.

testimonials.name: Deepika Suresh
testimonials.quote: The combination of strength training and yoga has been game-changing. My back pain is gone, my posture improved, and I feel 10 years younger. The holistic approach here is unmatched.

testimonials.name: Vikram Reddy
testimonials.quote: Best investment I've made in myself. The coaches are knowledgeable, the community is supportive, and the results speak for themselves. I've gained 8 kg of muscle in 8 months.

coachStories.title: From 95kg to 72kg: My Transformation Journey
coachStories.story: I started my fitness journey at Adze as a member, struggling with weight and confidence. Through consistent training and the support of this community, I transformed my body and my life. Now I'm paying it forward as a coach, helping others achieve their goals.

coachStories.title: Building Adze: From Garage to Community
coachStories.story: Adze started in my garage with a few friends who wanted better training. We believed fitness should be accessible, supportive, and transformative. Today, we're a family of 450+ members, but the core values remain the same: real people, real progress, real community.
